name: expense-tracker
author: Anand
description: - Designed and developed an expense management website that enabled individuals to efficiently track and manage their expenses. - The web-based application performed all CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations to efficiently manage individual's needs. - Included User Authentication that makes this application accessible to multiple users - Live Demo [https://spend-wise.onrender.com/](https://spend-wise.onrender.com/)
